headline: Dow Inc. (DOW) Stock Drops Despite Market Gains: Important Facts to Note

headline: Dow Announces Agreement to Sell its 50% Ownership in DowAksa Joint Venture
summary: Dow (NYSE: DOW) today announced that it has signed a sale and purchase agreement to sell its 50% interest in DowAksa Advanced Composites Holdings BV (DowAksa) to Aksa Akrilik Kimya Sanayii A.Ş., a company of Akkök Holding. Aksa Aksa Akrilik Kimya Sanayii A.Ş., the other 50% joint venture partner, has agreed to acquire Dow's 50% interest. Dow's proceeds from the sale are expected to be $125 million, which reflects, after accounting for debt, an enterprise value of approximately 10x the estimated
